roleset.name: quit, cease employment

example.name: simple NP
example.text: NW Ayer resigned the account about two weeks ago.

example.name: conjoined
example.text: Michael K. Russell will resign rather than relocate to Lower Slobovia.

example.name: with preposition
example.text: Mr. Stromach resigned as chief executive officer last year.

example.name: Example with arg 0 and 1
example.text: the resignation of William Allen as chairman of the U.S. CivilRights Commission
example.arg: as chairman of the U.S. CivilRights Commission

roleset.note: RESIGN-V NOTES: Ignore the "rather than ..." (from resign.01-v)
RESIGNATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on resign.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from resignation.01-n)

roleset.name: adjectival, giving up (as in despair)

example.name: sigh
example.text: Mr. Jones, whose twangy voice and folksy ways belie an intense businessman who works 16-hour days, is resigned [*]to the hefty salaries he pays his players these days.
example.arg: Mr. Jones, whose twangy voice and folksy ways belie an intense businessman who works 16-hour days,
the hefty salaries he pays his players these days.

example.text: And I know now, as I knew then, that each heart suffered with mine the agony of the Titan in his resignation to fate.

roleset.note: RESIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resign' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus (from resign.02-v predicate notes)
RESIGNATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No corresponding VNcls. (from resignation.02-n)

roleset.name: re-sign, sign again

role.descr: Signed as what, what role arg1 is signed as

example.name: Really ambiguous...but other sense also seems weird
example.text: N W Ayer , the New York agency that had handled the account since 1963 , resigned the account about two weeks ago .
example.arg: N W Ayer , the New York agency that had handled the account since 1963

example.name: Music domain, more typical usage
example.text: They resigned her in 1969 attempting, once again, to fit her into a pop niche since it seemed her voice was beyond categorization.
example.arg: attempting, once again, to fit her into a pop niche since it seemed her voice was beyond categorization.

example.name: Sports domain
example.text: Kidd's contract expired and they resigned him as a free agent this past summer.

roleset.note: RESIGN-V NOTES: Context must be used where there is no hyphen to determine if this sense is appropriate. (from resign.03-v)
